info.name: Alphabet Soup
info.attribution:
The room design and all game elements are by LawDawg96 are are released into the Public Domain as CC0.

The library image was generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "black and white cube dice with letters on the sides in a plain white bowl".
info.description: Race against the timer to find the most words using letters on dice in a grid. Most points wins.
info.helpText:
Players sit in seats. Press the restart button at the bottom to choose options. Click start button at top to begin. Players type words into the space below their seat and press Enter key. Words form a list below the player's seat that only that player can see. That list can be edited in case of a mistake.

When the timer ends, all player lists are displayed. You can click on any player's list to see possible misspellings indicated using the browser's built-in spell checker. A "Validate" button will appear to give you the option to automatically remove all duplicates, all words shorter than the value set in the options menu, and alphabetize the lists so it is easier to compare.

Manually calculate scores and click on the scoreboard to enter the scores.

fields.text: Are you sure you want to roll the dice and start the timer?

Press OK to take the following actions on all word lists: remove all numerals, remove words shorter than the pre-set minimum length, remove words duplicated on any list, and rearrange the lists into alphabetical order. Duplicate words that are removed can be displayed separately using another button.

loopRoutine: //Do this loop for all 8 players, but only if there is text is in the list.
//Remove numbers to avoid conflicts with separator
var listArray = ${text} split '\u000a' //Convert text string to array
//Build new array to avoid shallow copy problems
var noDup = push ${PID} // Add PID to end for separator
var listString = ${tempArray} join '\u000a' //Convert array back to string text
